item.title: 2026 Winter Olympics: Ralph Lauren unveils Team USA uniforms
item.description: Ralph Lauren revealed Team USA’s Milan Cortina Winter Olympics looks Thursday, complete with Americana knit sweaters and plenty of vintage call-backs

item.title: Average US long-term mortgage rate falls to 6.19%, near its low for the year
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year U.S. mortgage fell again this week, slipping close to its low point so far this year
